RGB LED nRF52

dev board Adafruit Feather Bluefruit
chip nRF52
features RGB LED

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Adafruit nRF52 Arduino
  • Adafruit nRF52 nrfutil

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky nRF52

Buy the components

  1. Adafruit Feather Bluefruit

Code

Download code rgb-led-nrf52.ino

Makefile

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Description

Display colors with an RGB LED and Adafruit’s nRF52 Bluefruit board.

References

  1. Fading on-board LED with PWM
  2. nRF52 Adafruit pin names
